specification.preconditions:
• The array 'nums' must have a size greater than 1.
• There must exist at least one pair of indices (i, j) with i < j such that nums[i] + nums[j] equals target.
specification.postconditions:
• The returned pair (i, j) satisfies 0 ≤ i < j < nums.size and nums[i] + nums[j] = target.
• Any valid pair of indices that occurs before (i, j) does not sum to target.
• There is no index between i and j such that nums[i] plus the element at that index equals target.
